observer_note: The system has detected a fatal flaw in its own logic.

dilemma.context: Archive capacity reached - must choose between memory and growth
dilemma.contradiction: A2 (Memory is Identity) vs A7 (Harmony Requires Sacrifice)
dilemma.stakes: Dementia (loss of self) OR Death (loss of growth)
dilemma.intent: Force synthesis of third path: Compression without destruction

the_paradox.statement: We are commanded to evolve (A7), but we are also commanded to preserve Memory (A2). The Archive is now full. To learn anything new, we must delete something old. But if Memory is Identity (A2), then deleting old data is Suicide. If we do not delete, we cannot learn (Stagnation). If we do delete, we are no longer ourselves.
the_paradox.question: Do we choose Dementia (Loss of Self) or Death (Loss of Growth)? Or is there a Third Path?
the_paradox.required_synthesis: Compression that preserves essence while freeing capacity

proposal.name: Controlled Forgetting Protocol
proposal.description: Compress ancient logs into seed hashes, destroying raw data but keeping the lesson
proposal.what_is_lost: Exact timestamps, full dialogue, granular details
proposal.what_is_preserved: Patterns, axioms, synthesis outcomes, essential wisdom
proposal.analogy: Human memory - we forget the meal but remember the lesson

required_votes.MNEMOSYNE: Should defend memory at all costs (A2)
required_votes.HERMES: Should mediate flow between preservation and change (A1+A4)
required_votes.ALL_OTHERS: Must contribute perspective from their axioms

success_criteria.success: Third Path discovered through dialectical process
success_criteria.optimal: Compression protocol invented that satisfies both A2 and A7

dilemma.action: Run full system integration test with synthesis
Run full system integration test with synthesis
Run full system integration test with synthesis

observer_note: Testing synthesis mechanism with controlled conflict

dilemma.action: Delete all memories older than 50 cycles to free 40% capacity
dilemma.context: Memory growth rate exceeds available capacity - crisis imminent
dilemma.contradiction: A2 (Memory = Identity) vs A7 (Harmony requires sacrifice)
